DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether 2 weeks of treatment with AZD1446 compared to placebo improves ADHD symptoms and is well tolerated.
DOC.brief_title: Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Tolerability of AZD1446 in Adult ADHD Patients.
DOC.criteria: A confirmed diagnosis of ADHD Patient understands and is willing to comply with all study requirements Adults between the ages of 1865 inclusive Current psychiatric disorder other than ADHD Previous randomization into this study Women with a positive pregnancy test
